headline: Ford (F)’s Latest Announcement Was “Very Positive,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F)’s shares are up by 37.9% year-to-date. The firm made an important announcement on Monday when it revealed that it would take $19.5 billion write-down, which includes an $8.5 billion […]

headline: Ford Recalls 272,000 U.S. Vehicles Over Park Function Defect
summary: Software flaw could cause vehicles to roll away; fix to be provided free of charge.

headline: Wall Street Roundup: Micron Earnings, EV Check-In
summary: Micron (MU) earnings take it to a new high. EV check-in with Ford. Rivian rally, Tesla quietly drifting higher.

raw.headline: Wall Street Roundup: Micron Earnings, EV Check-In

headline: 1 Industrials Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. They are also bound to benefit from a friendlier regulatory environment with the Trump administration, and this excitement has led to a six-month gain of 18.2% for the sector - higher than the S&P 500’s 13% return.

headline: US car buyers reverse major trend in second half of 2025
summary: Carmakers such as Ford played the change in the U.S. economic policy perfectly. The American auto industry had just weeks notice that President Donald Trump was moving forward with a plan to impose universal tariffs on all imports coming into the country, and that automotive tariffs would be ...
